history.proof: intros n a. unfold extEqual. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - simpl. apply Nat.bits_inj. sfirstorder depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hxy was not found in the current environment.

original: intros n a. unfold extEqual. induction n as [|n' IHn]. - intros x y Hxy. simpl. apply Hxy. - intros x y Hxy. simpl. apply IHn. intros i. apply Hxy.
